    • Method Detail

      • getStdIn

        public OutputStream getStdIn()
                      throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Container
        Get the standard input of a container. While this could technically also be part of Container.attach(OutputStream, OutputStream), DockerContainer requires it to be specially handled, because the Docker implementation lacks a method to attach any InputStream
        Specified by:
        getStdIn in interface Container
        Returns:
        an input stream into the default input of the docker container
        Throws:
        Exception - on any container library specific exception

        Specified by:

        stdErr - Standard error
        Throws:
        Exception - on any container library specific exception

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Specified by:
        getId in interface Container
        Returns:
        the container id, that the implementation can use to find a previously created container

        public long getConsumedCPUTime()
                        throws InterruptedException
        Specified by:
        getConsumedCPUTime in interface Container
